sect1.title: Install &sippi;
sect1.para: Download the latest version of SIPPI from http://sippi.sourceforge.net.

sect2.title: SGeMS (optional)
sect2.para: To make use of the SISIM and SNESIM type prior models, SGeMS needs to be available.
Currently only SGeMS version 2.1 (download) for Windows is supported by SIPPI.

sect1.title: Install development version of SIPPI from github
sect1.para:
If you want to test out the current development version of SIPPI (less stable and documented) then you can get the code using git. SIPPI makes heave use of the mGstat toolbox which you will also need:
git clone --recursive https://github.com/cultpenguin/sippi.git SIPPI
Then add a path to both SIPPI and mGstat in Matlab using
>> addpath INSTALL_DIR/SIPPI >> sippi_set_path
